"What can we do?" you ask.Dr. Vivaldi looks at you thoughtfully, then says,"If there is a war, we cannot expect to survive. Iam going to talk to the Grand Akpar. But here,take my gold bracelet. If you give it to the guard,he will let you escape." "But what will happen to you? I don't want toleave you here. I'll go to the Grand Akpar withyou!" Dr. Vivaldi replies, "Think carefully before youmake such a decision."

If you decide to face the Grand Akpar with Dr.Vivaldi If you decide to escape while you still have achance
